title: Have they seen DC?
author: VD
content_html:
Or Atlanta, or Detroit….

Child welfare officials told the judge the children were living in an authoritarian environment that left girls at risk of sexual abuse and raised boys to become sexual perpetrators.

It’s also noteworthy that the warrant which was used to justify the raid on the FLDS property was just dropped. This isn’t the final confirmation that the call which prompted the warrant was a fake, but that’s obviously coming in the near future.
